alert.note: Alert for Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:55AM EDT until April 05 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM EDT FOR INGHAM COUNTY... At 1155 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Williamston to Leslie, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lansing... Mason... Williamston... Leslie... Stockbridge... Aurelius... Onondaga... Bunker Hill... Webberville... Dansville... Eden... Fitchburg... Bell Oak... Mason Jewett Airport... Okemos... Haslett... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for south central Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
